info.name: Acane Blade
info.desription: One who chooses to channel magic into a blade.

description.p: Ones who choose to channel magic into their blades

sheet.description: Ones who choose to channel magic into thier blades

description.p: Your blade has a power to use the lifeforce of it's foes as spells. You now have spell points that is stored up to 360. Whenever you defeat an enemy with a blade, you gain points equal to your wizard level plus your spell modifier.
You can use these points to recover a spell slot at the cost of the spell slot level multiplied by 40.

sheet.description: Whenever you defeat a foe with a blade, you gain {{level:wizard} + {profiency + intelligence:modifier}(max of 360), you can use spell slot level times 40 to recover that spell slot level.

description.p: You can feel the magic flowing into your blade. Whenever you hit with an attack, you can use a spell slot to deal 2d8 physic damage plus an additional 1d8 for every level higher than 1st level used.

sheet.description: When you hit with an attck, you can use a spell slot to deal 2d8 physic damage, for every spell slot level used higher than 1st add an additional 1d8

description.p: At 2nd level, you gain proficiencies in martial weapons.

sheet.description: You gain proficiencies in martial weapons.

description.p: You can channel your thoughts into your blade, when ever you attack, add your Intelligence modifier to the damage.

sheet.description: Whenever you deal damage, add {{intelligence:modifier}} to your damage.

description.p: You feel power coming from your blade. Any enchantments on your blade will grant you benifits related to the enchantment.
For example, a +1 Raipier will give you +1 AC or a Fire Short Sword will give you fire resistance.

sheet.description: You recieve benefits related to the enchantments on your blade.

description.p: You can channel your energy to alter your blade's properties. You can use up to a 8th level spell to give your blade an enchantment until your next short rest. You can not use this feature again until a long rest or during combat.
Spells like Summon Elemental will increase damage done to elementals by a 1d8. Death spells will make the blade deal an extra 5d10 necrotic damage.

sheet.description: You can use an 8th level spell to enchant your blade. You cannot do this during combat.
